name: Green Life Custom Scrollbar
author: Asiqur Rahman

sections.description:
Modern and sexy scrollbar for desktop and mobile browsers. You can customize the scrollbar as you want.

You can change scrollbar options from settings menu. To customize your scrollbar go to Settings > GL Scrollbar.
sections.installation:
Install from wordpress.org:

  1. Go to Plugins > Add New.
  2. Search for “Green Life Custom Scrollbar”
  3. Install and Active it.
  4. To customize scrollbar go to Settings > GL Scrollbar.

Install from ZIP file:

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use Settings->GL Scrollbar screen to customize the plugin
sections.faq: Allows you to change browser default scrollbar with a customizable morden scrollbar.
sections.changelog:
1.3

  • Modified PHP Codes For Better Performance.
  • Options UI Updated.

1.0

  • Initial Release.
